analysis.input_vector: Pilot observed: 'We monitor the curve... it must mean something later.'
analysis.output_vector: System overlaid the data. The curve is not dissipating; it is gravitating towards a center.
analysis.key_insight: The heat is not being lost; it is being stored. The system is no longer just processing; it is incubating.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: The Omen: An unnatural stillness implies a coming birth.
